Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Federation of Shorthand Reporters Records WAG.193
1 Linear Feet (1 box)
1968-1986
Historical/Biographical Note
The Federation of Shorthand Reporters consists of members who do stenographic reporting for law firms in New York City.
Scope and Contents
The collection includes: contracts, papers from the ad hoc computer committee, strike files (1968, 1980, and 1986, grievances, District Council 1707 (Federation of Shorthand Reporters used to be affiliated), newspaper articles, arbitration documents, and membership lists.
